itunes:title: Episode 064: Arkady Rossovich (feat. Ben Percy)
title: Episode 064: Arkady Rossovich (feat. Ben Percy)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 64 of CEREBRO, Connor and X-Office writer Ben Percy (X-Force, Wolverine) synthesize carbonadium with Arkady Rossovich, the ruthless Omega Red! Plus: X Lives and X Deaths of Wolverine! Beast versus Sage! The crimes of Colossus! All this and more as Ben discusses his work in the Age of Krakoa.

The CEREBRO character file on Omega Red begins at 52:43.

(Content Advisory: Arkady's story includes torture, brainwashing, and the serial killing of children, with implied child sex abuse.)



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
